strategy.title: Overview
steps: Complete all meta achievements for classic battlegrounds
Includes: Alterac Valley, Arathi Basin, Eye of the Storm, Warsong Gulch
One of the longest PvP grinds in the game

strategy.title: Approach
steps: Focus on one battleground at a time
Read each sub-achievement carefully - some have specific requirements
Some achievements need coordination (premade groups help)
Track your progress in the achievement panel

strategy.title: Difficult Achievements
steps: Warsong Gulch Perfection: Win 3-0 without dying
We Had It All Along: Win AB by 10 points or less
The Grim Reaper: Get 30 HKs in a single AV
Stormtrooper: Kill 5 flag carriers in a single EotS

strategy.title: Tips
steps: Join a PvP guild or community for premade groups
Some achievements are easier during BG bonus weekends
Certain achievements may require specific specs or classes
Be patient - this takes months of dedicated PvP
